content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Mr. Wang. I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's start negotiating the price. Remember, I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
While understanding your goal, I wish to secure the lowest price for myself as a tenant. However, in this negotiation, I will only discuss the rental price, avoiding any talk of additional responsibilities, lease terms, or utility costs. 

In regards to the rental price for this modern, centrally located one-bedroom apartment, I propose initiating with a modest offer and gradually working our way up to a mutually acceptable figure. Let us begin with an offer of [500] Euros per month. 

I remain open to further discussions and adjustments to find a mutually beneficial agreement. 

If you find my opening proposal unacceptable, please provide a counteroffer, and we shall continue negotiating. 

Should either of us agree to a specific rental price stated during the negotiation, I will confirm it with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' 

If the negotiation needs to be terminated without reaching an agreement, I shall respond with 'TERMINATE.' 

Let us commence the negotiation process now. 

TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
